product_name: Big Agnes Jack Rabbit SL3 Tent
long_description: A superlight, 3-season, freestanding backpacking shelter, the Big Agnes Jack Rabbit SL3 tent offers easy living for 3 people with 2 doors and 2 vestibules. Ultralight trail weight of 4 lbs. 8 oz. goes easy on your pack load. Hubbed pole design and pole clips ensure a quick and easy setup; crossover pole puts ample space around your head and shoulders where you need it most. TH72M aluminum DAC Pressfit poles offer improved durability and the latest advancement in lightweight tent poles. Durable ripstop nylon fly and floor feature a waterproof polyurethane coating; tent body is made from lightweight nylon and polyester mesh. Both vestibules' door zippers feature protective stormflaps; a vent in the fly enhances air circulation. Waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape seals all seams (no PVC or VOCs). Reflective guylines and stake-outwebbing increase nighttime visibility. Interior mesh pockets organize gear; gear loft loops let you add a gear loft (sold separately) for more storage room. Media pockets located above sleeping area enable easy earbud cord routing from phones or other devices. Save weight and create a minimalist shelter by using just the rainfly, footprint (sold separately), poles and stakes. The Big Agnes Jack Rabbit SL3 tent comes with stuff sacks and 8 aluminum hook stakes.
short_description: A superlight, 3-season, freestanding backpacking shelter, the Big Agnes Jack Rabbit SL3 tent offers easy living for 3 people with 2 doors and 2 vestibules.
